author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Royal Caribbean launches new shore excursion travel agent website - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Royal Caribbean launches new shore excursion travel agent website Published on : Tuesday, September 22, 2015
With the recent introduction of an expanded shore excursion program Royal Caribbean is now making it easier than ever for travel partners to help plan their client’s vacation with a new website dedicated to shore excursions. This new online resource is a one-stop shop for travel agents, providing fast and convenient access to all the latest information on shore excursions. Travel partners can learn about Royal Caribbean’s commission program as well as have access to marketing resources such as tour clips and photography to help plan their clients’ personalized experiences while onboard Royal Caribbean.
Among the lineup of innovative features available, the website offers:
Ability to share tour clips and download imagery to leverage as selling tools Highlight our product differentiated tours by tour category and destination Dedicated Commission Page with Groups and Private Journeys Information Tour Ratings Electronic Magazine – Highlights our top tours in every single port of call around the world Shore Excursion Promotions Page Dedicated page to each Destination we visit around the world, which will feature unique tours within those destinations, as well as Marketing Resources to use as selling tools. Resources Page – which will provide additional resources for selling Downloadable flyers which feature our top selling and most unique tours around the world
